about_the_game:
In the far north, a strange melody has been luring all manner of monsters, misfits, and miscreants into the depths below. A mysterious power lurks beneath, but to uncover the secrets of this place, you'll need to be equipped with all the wit, strength, and cunning that you can muster, in your Journey to the Rift!

Text-based fun for your imagination!

Uncover the secrets of a mysterious dungeon in this text-based adventure, where every adventure is different! Establish a base camp, venture forth into the dungeon, and get ready for the many puzzles, monsters, and other strange denizens that await! Tackle each encounter in your own way, with each situation having multiple ways to progress.

A different adventure with each playthrough

With over a hundred unique encounters, no two playthroughs will be the same. To add even more variety, the residents of the dungeon will react to how you have handled previous encounters, allowing you to discover different secrets based on how you play! The choices you make will have far reaching consequences beyond the dungeon, so choose wisely!

Make your base camp, a base home!

Between episodes of spelunking you'll need a place to rest and recuperate. Grow your base camp into a burgeoning settlement complete with everything you'll need for your adventures. Expand enough and you'll attract an eclectic gang of characters that can offer their help, while giving you more opportunities for special quests and adventures!

highlighted.name: Who Knows, Maybe It'll Catch On?
